  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:AA308_3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>AA308_3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Language and thought: introducing representation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache und gedacht: Vorstellen der 
Darstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage et pensé : présentation de la 
représentation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua e pensado: introduzindo a 
respresentação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Linguaggio e pensato: introdurre 
rappresentazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γλώσσα και σκεπτόμενος: εισαγωγή της 
αντιπροσώπευσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lenguaje y pensado: introducir la 
representación</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">How does what you say come to mean something? Does what you say inherently represent what you, the speaker, think it means, whatever that might be, or does what you say carry its own meaning, separate from your intentions in saying it? This unit introduces you to the key questions about how meaning is conveyed in language.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Arts and History</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie, was Sie kommen, etwas zu bedeuten sagen? 
Was Sie Sagen was Sie, der Sprecher, es denken, in sich selbst 
bedeuten darstellen, was auch immer konnte das sein, oder, was Sie 
Sagen seine eigene Bedeutung, getrennt von Ihren Absichten tragen, 
wenn Sie sie sagen? Diese Maßeinheit stellt Sie zu den 
Schlüsselfragen über vor, wie Bedeutung in Sprache übermittelt 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment  ce que vous dites venez pour signifier 
quelque chose ? Ce qui vous la parole le représente en soi ce 
que vous, l'orateur, pensez signifie est-ce que, que ce pourrait 
être, ou  ce qui vous parole portez sa propre signification, séparé
de vos intentions pour la dire ? Cette unité vous présente aux
questions principales au sujet de la façon dont la signification est 
donnée en langage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como  o que você diz vem significar algo? O
que você a palavra o representa inerente o que você, altofalante, 
pensa significa, o que quer que aquele pôde ser, ou  o que você 
palavra carrega seu próprio meaning, separado de suas intenções em 
o dizer? Esta unidade introdu-lo às perguntas chaves sobre como
o meaning é feito saber na língua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come che cosa dite venite significare qualcosa? 
Che cosa opinione inerentemente la rappresentate che cosa, 
l'altoparlante, pensate significate, qualunque quello potrebbe essere,
o che cosa opinione trasportate il relativo proprio significato, a 
parte dalle vostre intenzioni nel dirlo? Questa unità li 
introduce alle domande chiave circa come il significato è espresso in
linguaggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τι να πει έρχεστε να σημάνετε κάτι; Τι να 
πει εγγενώς αντιπροσωπεύετε ποιος, ο ομιλητής, σκέφτεστε ότι 
σημαίνει, οποιοσδήποτε αυτός να είναι, ή τι να πει φέρνετε την 
έννοιά της, χωριστή από τις προθέσεις σας στο ρητό του; 
Αυτή η μονάδα σας εισάγει στις ερωτήσεις κλειδή για το πώς
η έννοια μεταβιβάζεται στη γλώσσα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo  qué usted dijo viene significar algo? 
¿Qué usted la opinión intrínsecamente lo representa qué 
usted, el locutor, piensa significa, lo que ése pudo ser, o  qué 
usted opinión llevó su propio significado, a parte de sus 
intenciones en decirlo? Esta unidad le introduce a las preguntas
dominantes sobre cómo el significado se transporta en lenguaje.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste und Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts et histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes e history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti e storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες και ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes e historia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
